Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Moderno in Rimini, you'll be minutes from Anfiteatro Romano and The Surgeon's House. This hotel is within close proximity of Rimini City Museum and Tempio Malatestiano.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 air-conditioned guestrooms. Conveniences include phones and desks.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 40 air-conditioned guestrooms. Conveniences include phones and desks.

With a stay at Hotel Moderno in Rimini, you'll be minutes from Anfiteatro Romano and The Surgeon's House. This hotel is within close proximity of Rimini City Museum and Tempio Malatestiano.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Anfiteatro Romano - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
The Surgeon's House - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Rimini City Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Tempio Malatestiano - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bronze Statue of Paul V - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Antica Pescheria - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Piazza Tre Martiri - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Piazza Cavour - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Fontana della Pigna - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Rimini City Hall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Tiberius Bridge - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Palazzo dell'Arengo e del Podesta - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Teatro Amintore Galli - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Church of Sant'Agostino - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Church of San Giuliano Martire - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Moderno is Rimini (RMI-Federico Fellini Intl.) - 6 km / 3.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
